H0.text: Who played the Riddler in the original Batman TV series. Frank Gorshin's contemporary, Burgess Meredith

H1.text: Who played the Riddler in the original Batman TV series. Character actor, Victor Buono

H2.text: Who played the Riddler in the original Batman TV series. Comedian and actor, Don Knotts

H3.text: Who played the Riddler in the original Batman TV series. Gorshin

A4.text: Frank Gorshin as The Riddler for a pair of episodes when Gorshin's new agents at William Morris demanded more money.
